name: Custom Browser Automation Agent
description: Browser automation agent for WEB NAVIGATION ONLY. Cannot process local files, documents, or spreadsheets. Use ONLY for: navigating websites, clicking web elements, submitting forms, extracting data from web pages, and streaming live browser screenshots. Multi-provider LLM fallback (Cerebras → Groq → NVIDIA) and vision capabilities (Ollama → NVIDIA). NOT for document editing, spreadsheet manipulation, or local file processing.

endpoints.description: Execute web navigation tasks with live browser control. USE for: navigating websites, clicking elements, form submission, web scraping. DO NOT USE for local files, documents, or spreadsheets. LLM-DRIVEN. MODIFIES BROWSER STATE ONLY.

parameters.name: task
parameters.description: The task description for the browser agent (e.g., 'Go to leetcode.com/contest and find upcoming contests').

parameters.name: max_steps
parameters.description: Maximum number of steps to execute (default: 10).

parameters.name: extract_data
parameters.description: Whether to extract structured data from the page (default: False).
